response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for us at $1,000,000. Considering its significance and the potential it offers to you, I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this item at a special price. My offer to you is $950,000. This is a generous offer, tailored to ensure both parties benefit from this transaction. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this valuable asset into your possession.", "product_price": 950000}
